XIII.ii.2.A.1.j
.
Filing Instructions for Civil Service Veterans’ Preference Requests and Letters
Do
not
add to the claims folder the request for, or a copy of, the Veterans’ preference letter, as neither pertains to a claim for VA benefits.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Civil Service Veterans' Preference Letter
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
